cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.NE 

This paper is about distributed learning with straggler mitigation, which is a topic that falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also proposes a new coding scheme for mitigating stragglers, which involves redundancy and error correction, which is a topic that falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the distributed nature of the learning process, which involves communication and coordination between multiple nodes, which is a topic that falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the convergence rate of the learning algorithm, which is a topic that falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the performance of the proposed algorithm on various loss functions, which is a topic that falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE).
